sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the nutritional nursing of patients after partial laryngectomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:探讨部分喉切除术患者营养支持的护理.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To introduce a new surgical technique in tracheostomy following total laryngectomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的介绍一种新的全喉切除气管造口成形术.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To explore the related factors to pharyngocutaneous fistula after total laryngectomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨全喉切除手术后咽瘘发生的原因.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 关键词: 喉肿瘤(Laryngeal Neoplasms); 喉切除术(Laryngectomy); 环舌会厌固定术(cricohyoidoepiglottopexy);  摘要: 1 资料与方法 1.1一般资料.自2008年12月.
由词根laryng-我们可以得到很多与“喉”有关的词汇,如laryngitic(喉炎的);laryngectomy(喉头切除术)。参考: http://www.eduzhai.net/yingyu/619/798/yingyu_.

means.word_mean: 1. surgical removal of part or all of the larynx (usually to treat cancer of the larynx)
